Title: Dr. Pradhan
Body: Electrical Engineering, Annamalai University, 1969 EXPERIENCE: Educational: COE Endowed Chair Professor , Computer Science, Texas A&M University, January 1992-present; Professor , Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Massachusetts, January 1983-January 1992; Associate Professor , School of Engineering, Oakland University, September 1978-December 1982; Research Associate Professor , Stanford University, June 1979-August 1979; Associate Professor , Department of Computer Science, University of Regina, September 1973-July 1978.
